characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Once both sides are deployed but before the first playertakes their turns, this unit can move as if it were their movement phase. This unit cannot end this move within 9" of any enemy models. If both players have units that can do this, the player who is taking the first turn moves their units first. If all of the models embarked on a transport vehicle have this ability, then the transport vehicle can make the move instead
